reviewText:
This seems to be the only video on Candlemaking , around. I was unable to locate a copy in any Library in my area, so I had to buy it sight unseen.
I was familiar with Sharyn Pak from her Soapmaking video, which I merely borrowed from the Library. She's still as awkward on camera in this video, as in the the other one I've seen,  a bit difficult to
watch (and listen to).But the information is clearly spelled out, and I find it really helpful to have a video presentation of the steps involved.
